arts.sum: Mainz secured their first win of the season with an emphatic 4-1 victory at Augsburg, with Kaishu Sano scoring once and creating two more, even despite Dominik Kohr's red card. Henriksen had promised an attacking approach before the match, saying: "We'll try again to be attacking, to score goals and get the most out of the game." His team certainly delivered on that promise, while Sandro Wagner's Augsburg suffered their third consecutive defeat following their opening day victory over Freiburg .

arts.ttl: Mainz display vintage away performance to down Augsburg
arts.sum: Bo Henriksen’s side produced the perfect response to last week’s defeat against RB Leipzig, sweeping past Augsburg 4-1 at the WWK Arena.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Mainz preview: Which club can turn their momentum around?
arts.sum: Augsburg host Mainz this Saturday in what promises to be a bit of an early-season scrap at the WWK Arena. Which club can turn their momentum around?

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs Mainz - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
